examples: What an extraordinary thing to say!
The president took the extraordinary step of apologizing publicly for his behaviour!
¡El presidente dio el extraordinario paso de disculparse públicamente por su comportamiento!
We are a normal family dealing with extraordinary circumstances.
Somos una familia normal que se enfrenta a circunstancias extraordinarias.
It's extraordinary that he managed to sleep through the party.
Es extraordinario que se las arreglara para dormir durante toda la fiesta.
